acceptanceCriteria.description: バー端からドラッグで依存線作成モードに入る
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Connection points support mouse down events to start dependency creation drag mode. Includes visual feedback with animated line following cursor, tooltips, and crosshair cursor. Drag state management integrated with performance monitoring.

acceptanceCriteria.description: ターゲットバーへのスナップと依存作成が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Target detection with visual snapping, API integration for dependency creation with comprehensive error handling. Cursor position maps to target tasks with pulsing borders and drop indicators.

acceptanceCriteria.description: 依存線の削除（右クリック→削除）が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Right-click context menu implemented on dependency lines with confirmation dialog. Integration with deleteDependency API function from useDependencies hook. Error handling and user feedback included.

acceptanceCriteria.description: 循環依存検証UI（警告表示）が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: DFS-based circular dependency detection with professional warning modal and path visualization. Shows detailed circular path information with cancel/force create options.

T010.title: Undo/Redo・依存自動調整システム

acceptanceCriteria.description: バー移動/伸縮操作のUndo/Redo（Ctrl+Z/Y）が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Command pattern architecture with bar operations (move, resize, progress) wrapped in undoable commands. Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Z/Y) implemented with visual feedback and telemetry integration.

acceptanceCriteria.description: 依存作成/削除のUndo/Redoが動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: DependencyCommand classes with full command pattern implementation. Enhanced useDependenciesWithUndo hook with circular dependency prevention. Complete integration with keyboard shortcuts and existing command history.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Issue編集（詳細パネル）のUndo/Redoが動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: IssueEditCommand implementation with field-level granular undo support. useIssueWithUndo hook with auto-save and form state management. Enhanced IssueDetailPanel with keyboard shortcuts integration and professional UX.

acceptanceCriteria.description: 先行タスク移動時の後続自動シフト（暫定ロジック）が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Advanced scheduling algorithm with FS constraint logic, cascading dependency resolution, and performance optimization. Automatic calculation and adjustment of successor tasks when predecessors move.

acceptanceCriteria.description: 自動調整結果もUndo対象に含まれる
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Composite command pattern wrapping primary + secondary operations. Single atomic undo operation for all auto-generated scheduling changes. AutoSchedulingCommand implementation with proper rollback.

acceptanceCriteria.description: 操作履歴スタック（最大20件）管理が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Enhanced useUndoRedo hook with configurable max history size (20 items), automatic truncation, smart memory cleanup, and FIFO overflow protection. Proper session state management implemented.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Undo/Redo実行時のテレメトリ送信が動作する
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Comprehensive telemetry system with audit logs API integration. Tracks all operation types with batched sending, execution metrics, memory usage, and error tracking. Project-scoped telemetry with graceful fallbacks.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Enhanced rate limiting with exponential backoff (5 attempts → 5min, 10 → 15min, 15 → 1hr lockout)
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: RateLimitAttempt model with persistent storage, exponential backoff algorithm, and per-project client tracking. Automatic lockout expiration and reset functionality.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Session-based access token management (24-hour expiration with refresh capability)
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: JWT tokens with AuthSession database tracking, token rotation on refresh, automatic cleanup of expired sessions. Secure access (24hr) and refresh (7 days) token lifecycle management.

acceptanceCriteria.description: ActivityLog integration for all authentication events (success/failure/lockout)
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Enhanced ActivityLog schema supporting auth entity types. Complete audit trail for authentication, refresh, logout events with client ID and metadata tracking.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Improved password validation with strength requirements (min 8 chars, mixed case)
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Server-side DTO validation with regex enforcement requiring lowercase, uppercase, numbers, and special characters. Clear validation error messages and strength requirements.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Token blacklist system for secure logout functionality
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: TokenBlacklist model with SHA-256 hashing for security. Both access and refresh tokens blacklisted on logout with automatic cleanup of expired entries.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Admin override mechanism for emergency project access
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: AdminOverride model with cryptographically secure tokens, time-bound expiration, and complete audit trail. Override usage logged with admin user and reason.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Comprehensive error handling with proper HTTP status codes
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Proper HTTP status codes (400, 401, 403, 404, 409, 429) with detailed error messages. Rate limiting responses include lockout duration and remaining attempts.

acceptanceCriteria.description: PATCH /issues/:id/progress endpoint supports leaf-task-only progress updates
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Single issue progress endpoint with leaf task validation. Only allows updates on tasks without children, preventing data corruption.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Batch progress update endpoint handles multiple issues in single transaction
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: POST /issues/progress/batch endpoint with database transaction wrapping, partial failure handling, and detailed response reporting.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Progress change validation prevents invalid parent task progress modification
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Server-side validation using hasChildren() checks. Returns 400 Bad Request with clear error messages for parent task update attempts.

acceptanceCriteria.description: ActivityLog captures progress changes with before/after values and user attribution
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Enhanced activity logging with progress-specific metadata including previousProgress, newProgress, and progressDelta tracking.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Progress aggregation automatically calculates parent task progress from children
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Weighted average calculation for parent tasks based on child task progress and estimated hours. Recursive aggregation up the task hierarchy.

acceptanceCriteria.description: API response includes computed progress metrics and validation results
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Rich response format with progressMetrics including effectiveProgress, childrenProgress, completionEstimate, and validation status.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Optimistic locking prevents concurrent progress update conflicts
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: ETag-based optimistic locking using issue version field. If-Match header validation prevents concurrent modification conflicts.

acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Professional glass-morphism modal with gradient backgrounds, enhanced error parsing, rate limiting feedback with countdown timers, password visibility toggle, and improved accessibility.

acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Comprehensive tokenManager service with secure localStorage operations, automatic expiration checking, token cleanup, and Map serialization support.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Background token refresh before expiration maintains seamless access
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Background refresh scheduling 5 minutes before expiration, non-blocking refresh operations, event-driven notifications, and proper cleanup on failures.

acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: Enhanced projects store with token lifecycle management, backward-compatible integration, event listeners for token expiration, and utility methods for validation.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Token validation on protected route navigation works reliably
acceptanceCriteria.implementationNotes: ProjectRouteGuard component for route protection, automatic token validation with refresh attempts, loading states, error handling, and HOC pattern integration.

Batch schedule updates minimize database roundtrips and lock contention
Schedule versioning tracks calculation timestamps and dependency changes
Cache invalidation strategy ensures fresh data without performance degradation
Database migration scripts handle schema changes with zero downtime
